name: Mayhem Delivery
description:
A prototype - the idea is to get the correct objects in the correct zones which if all are triggered you will win.
Use the buildings you have in your inventory to complete different puzzle levels, from simple conveyor belts, smart bomb balls detonators and more.


Controls are specified in Map1.

Not all tutorials are completed yet, this is heavily WIP
here are the current description of goals for every map

- Map1 has 3 victory zones, the 2 that are near the ground need one smart bomb ball each, and the 1 on the top of the map needs your player 

- Map2 has the victory zones work like in Map1

- Map3 has the victory zones work like in Map1

- Map4 has 3 victory zones, the big wide one needs the player, and the other two need one smart bomb ball each

- Map5 has 2 victory zones, one in the garage needs 50 physical boxes and one in the high station away from the garage needs the player

- Map6 has the victory zones work like in Map5, but now the one in the garage needs 10 packages containing smart bomb balls

- Sandbox has 1 victory zone and it needs the player

Player model https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/crash-dummy-0c5cf6b017ba48f1bb32244ae1fefd2d
